# init(frame:)

**Initializer**

Creates a custom item with the specified frame.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(frame: CGRect)
```

## Creating a custom item

- **init(frame:zIndex:)**: Creates a custom item with the specified frame and vertical stacking order in relation to other items in the group.

items.description: Creates a custom item with the specified frame and vertical stacking order in relation to other items in the group.
items.name: init(frame:zIndex:)
